serviceItems.title: AI & LLM Model Development
serviceItems.description: Building artificial intelligence and Large Language Models for comprehensive flood data analysis and accurate predictions.

serviceItems.title: Himawari Satellite Image Analysis
serviceItems.description: Processing and analyzing Himawari BMKG satellite imagery to detect changes in water levels and cloud conditions relevant to floods.

serviceItems.title: Multi-Source Data Integration
serviceItems.description: Combining historical flood data, verified journals, and surrounding environmental data for a holistic understanding.

serviceItems.title: Early Flood Warning System
serviceItems.description: Designing and implementing an efficient early warning system for risk mitigation and rapid response to potential floods.

processSteps.title: Data Collection & Briefing
processSteps.description: Understanding project needs, collecting Himawari satellite imagery, historical data, journals, and environmental data.

processSteps.title: System Design & Architecture
processSteps.description: Designing AI and LLM architecture, and planning data integration from various sources.

processSteps.title: Model Development & Training
processSteps.description: Building AI and LLM models, training them with relevant data, and performing initial validation.

processSteps.title: Integration & Testing
processSteps.description: Integrating the models into the monitoring system and conducting thorough testing for accuracy and performance.

processSteps.title: Implementation & Launch
processSteps.description: Deploying the early flood warning system and launching it for operational use.

processSteps.title: Continuous Monitoring & Optimization
processSteps.description: Continuously monitoring system performance, gathering feedback, and performing optimizations for improvement.

pricingPlans.name: Basic Package
pricingPlans.description: For initial feasibility studies and prototype development of the AI flood monitoring model.

pricingPlans.name: Development Package
pricingPlans.description: For core AI and LLM model development with comprehensive data integration.

pricingPlans.name: Full Package
pricingPlans.description: A complete solution for early flood monitoring with system implementation and ongoing support.
